summary: This document is a declaration from Teresa Rodelo, an employee of Amazon, regarding the authenticity of documents produced by Amazon in response to a law enforcement request related to the Epstein case. It confirms that the documents are business records and accurately describe the relevant transactions and events.

persons.name: Teresa Rodelo
persons.context: Teresa Rodelo declares the authenticity of documents produced by Amazon in response to a law enforcement request.

keyFacts: Teresa Rodelo is an employee of Amazon, Inc.
The document is a declaration regarding the authenticity of documents produced by Amazon.
The declaration states that the documents are business records kept in the ordinary course of business.
The declaration was executed on November 10, 2021.
The communication contains a notice about privileged and confidential information.
